name: tidal-linux
description: Cross-platform electron app for the Tidal Web Interface

scripts.deploy: sudo rm -rf ~/.local/share/TIDAL-linux-x64 && mkdir -p ~/.local/share && cp -R build/TIDAL-linux-x64 ~/.local/share && sudo chown root:root ~/.local/share/TIDAL-linux-x64/chrome-sandbox && sudo chmod 4755 ~/.local/share/TIDAL-linux-x64/chrome-sandbox
scripts.test: jshint main.js && jshint custom.js && node main.js

author: Val Knight
